description:
In this Bernina software 7 course we will start by using our Bernina Embroidery Software to create trapunto designs for our new trapunto quilt block.

  1. Planning before you do anything
  2. Digitize steps to follow
  3. Stitch settings and types
  4. Embroidery steps to match the digitize steps
  5. Stabilizers: how and when
  6. Batting: why specific types needed in this project
  7. Trapunto: what is it?
  8. Trapunto: How to achieve it
  9. Final finish off steps
  10. Quilt blocks created in next to no time
  11. Step by step you will follow to create your own
  12. Video recording that can be paused and re-winded
  13. Save your video on your computer and use it over and over
  14. Quilting will never be boring, and never be the same
  15. Enjoy a perfect outcome by following this steps.

I am sure you will, like me enjoy your Bernina Embroidery Software 7 and would use it for a lot more than just organizing your embroidery designs

I hope you will enjoy this course as much as I did when playing with my Bernina Embroidery Software 7.
title: Class13 BerninaEmbroiderySoftware Trapunto quilt
